attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to show my amazing president some support but homie did me dirty. I go to open the app and see “make America great again” so I showed my hispanic mom and she ain’t have to speak she hit my phone with the chancla. so then paranormal activity happened My walls started playing “somebody come get her she dancing like a stripper ay” you know I started vibing but them big fat cheeto popped up on my screen and I go scared because it was nasty and soggy it looked old mhmm. I just think over all I had a bad experience. this app is bad for children
attributes.title: tacos al pastor are better then this ✨✨

attributes.review: After a few days of downloading this app, my phone starting receiving calls from unknown numbers, up to 20 times a day. Then, earlier this morning, all of my apps were deleted, expect for this particular app. Now I have to contact Apple support to have them remove the virus from my phone and re-download all my previous information. Did I mention spam emails were sent from my personal work account as well? This app should be considered a danger to technology. .5/10 do not recommend, highly disappointed.
attributes.title: Highly unstable

attributes.review: i opened the app thinking it would be polite BUT NO the app was very rude to me, it called me names and i dont like them 😒😤😤 the app actually tried to kill me ?!?? like what 🔫🗡🗡🔪 during the killing 🥰 a ghost tried to invade my house, and i tried to kill and as the ghost i hide from the app. but that was not good enough for it 😔✋🏻 IT FOUND MEE 😳 i had died and i hope all of you come to my funeral at my house 😀😀 theres going to be other victims there. maybe youll find a friend 🥰🥰 truly a terrible app do not recommend if you are depressed. goodbye loves 😘
attributes.title: cannot believe what i just saw, truly a scary app 😳

attributes.review: This app is filled with very inappropriate images that have nothing to do with Donald J Trump for president. When opening the app I was confronted with horrifying images of Donald doing exercises wearing very minimal clothing. I do not feel this is an appropriate way to present yourself Mr President. Also after closing the app my phone was flooded with all sorts of spam messages and notifications from the app. A new notification every 30 seconds or so. Makes me wonder if this is possibly set up by the Chinese to spy on American citizens. ESPIONAGE!! Delete this app to keep the Chinese from getting our VERY IMPORTANT DATA!!
attributes.title: SPAM

attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP. just a glimpse: the first thing that you see when you open the app is a picture of trump as a naked baby!! which is disgusting. next, they ask you for all your security information like your social security number, your credit card info, a picture of your birthday certificate, etc. i have very high suspicions that they’re taking this information and sending it to the CHINESE GOVERNMENT to sell! as if trump needed any more money. DO. NOT. GET. THIS. APP. the most horrible, disgusting, vile, monstrous, ghastly, nauseating, appalling, hideous, hateful, sickening, hair raising app i have ever seen. A DISGRACE TO AMERICA
attributes.title: MAKE AMERICA HATEFUL AGAIN

attributes.review: this app is horrible. i was on this app and my little cousins were sitting next to me and right when i opened the app they started sobbing, they couldn’t handle it. the man in the screen looked so disgusting and has done so many bad things. they ran away and they were crying so hard they couldn’t breathe. we had to send them to the ER and they are still alive. they are fine now, but have to go to therapy 10 times a week. they won’t even talk to me anymore. this app has ruined my relationship with my little cousins.. i DO NOT recommend this app to anyone.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review:
I am so utterly shocked by this app, I am APPALLED! How dare he??? I know the Trump administration wants my personal data and to all of the fellow Americans who are white and Christian... you are under scrutiny. Why? Well, this app asked you to put in your PHONE NUMBER the second you get into the app! Absolutely disgusting, they will then get into our personal data... we cannot let this happen. I may not be full white but one thing I can say is this app is targeting all of the 
Christian, white, cis, conservatives in the US! Immediately rate this app the lowest you can. FORGET TIKTOK! THIS APP WILL STEAL YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION!!!!!!
attributes.title: WHITE CHRISTIANS: THIS WILL STEAL YOUR PERSONAL DATA!

attributes.review: well I’d like to start off and say how I’m not a racist since my mother in laws brothers boyfriends great grandmas fathers youngest sons dogs best friend, cat is black, I also do not understand how this app is still up and running I opened and was “welcomed” to a orangutan of a Cheeto puffs face like no to the no no no. It was very upsetting and the fumes and vibes coming from The photos were terrible especially for my young child like eyes. This is not acceptable behavior for any age😔 BUT It would be such a blessing to have this forever removed from the App Store for our own sanity😌 Have a terrific day everyone✨🙈🕺🏻🤗🧚🦋 #Bunkerboy #savebarron
attributes.title: No bueno

attributes.review: this is app is so weird! it tells me to put my pillow in the oven and then pick all the feathers out of inside of my pillow!! also, they advise me to also sleep on the right side of them bed! i will not tolerate this people to tell me what to do. PERIODT also, right when i open the app i see a disturbing picture of the hot cheeto man. like who tf wants to see that image. (not me) now the WORST part of this app is that they tell me to vote “trump2020” like WHAT. i’m so confused and disgusted. please, please don’t put your pillow in the oven and sleep on whatever side of the bed you want! also don’t vote for trump bby 😘🧚🏼🌺🦋🌸👀
attributes.title: oh god NO

attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. I downloaded it to keep up with the news and trump and whatnot, but now it’s made me not want to vote anymore. The app runs really slow, it took an entire hour for the app to actually open and when it did a picture of a naked Cheeto popped up. After this, my phone started running really slow and the battery runs out super quickly. The app also sends me more than 50 notifications a day, and some of the notifications look like they were written by a baby?? Would not recommend
attributes.title: Horrible
